originalText.text: Bond Vet is amazing. They truly care about your pet and follow up to make sure is all well and if I had any questions the day after. They went above and beyond and I trust them completely. You can tell they love animals and love what they do. Given that they see animals all day, they treat you pet as if it’s the first one they’ve ever met. Definitely recommend them and I don’t trust anybody regarding my Madison but he comes home happy and non-stressed.

originalText.text:
I would like to express gratitude to Dr. Martin and the Bond Vet Clinic Team Upper East Side at 86 St. for the quality and professional work.
Very polite, caring, and friendly staff. Cozy and comfortable environment.  Convenient location.
The doctor and nurses are very attentive.
We were looking for a vet clinic close to our home for spaying and vaccinating our kitten.
We chose Bond Vet clinic because all the information is on the website.
While searching for a clinic, we discovered that many vet clinics do not tell the cost of the surgery but offer to make an appointment with a doctor and only the doctor can tell the price. This seemed rather strange to us, since before planning a visit to the doctor, we must know the cost of the surgery.
The BOND clinic answered all our questions right away. Clear services and prices.
Before the surgery, Kimberly gave us comprehensive information with detailed instructions on what to do before the surgery, how the surgery would proceed, and what care would be required after the surgery.
After the surgery, we were in touch with Dr. Martin and Team for two weeks while our Zosya was recovering. During recovery, we felt constant care for our kitten.
Thank you!
We recommend Bond Vet Upper East Side at 86th St.

originalText.text: Dr. Williams and her assistant Michelle were amazing.  My fur baby Maple was treated with gentle loving care.  They both answered evey question.  I felt very well taken care of too.  Thanks so much for everything.

originalText.text:
I was looking for a better veterinarian and I found the Bond Vet. They treated my dog with so much love, from the beginning until the end. They even gave zeca a toy and snacks. I am
so glad for all the staff and for the love they have for their work. Thank you all. ❤️

originalText.text: Very grateful to Dr Martin and the Bond Vet UES team for making our final day with our beloved Lily as empathic and compassionate as possible. They went out of their way to fit us in even when they were fully booked and moving appointments around to accommodate us. 100% recommend this clinic.
